msg: Our paper Algorithmic Agents in the Hybrid Media System: Social Bots, Selective Amplification, and Partisan News about COVID-19 has been published in Human Communication Research
Check out our new tool BotAmp, which can compare the bot amplification levels of two sets of tweets
Our paper Online misinformation is linked to early COVID-19 vaccination hesitancy and refusal has been published in Scientific Reports

I was selected for Future Leaders Summit 2022, University of Michigan

Our paper Systematic comparison of graph embedding methods in practical tasks has been published in Physical Review E
Our paper Neutral bots probe political bias on social media has been published in Nature Communications
Our paper Use of and Comorbidities Associated With Diagnostic Codes for COVID-19 in US Health Insurance Claims has been published in JAMA Network Open
Our paper The Manufacture of Partisan Echo Chambers by Follow Train Abuse on Twitter has been accepted to ICWSM'22
Our paper New means, new measures: Assessing prescription drug seeking indicators over ten years of the opioid epidemic has been published in Addiction
New preprint Systematic comparison of graph embedding methods in practical tasks available
Our paper CoVaxxy: A Collection of English-Language Twitter Posts About COVID-19 Vaccines has been published in the proceedings of ICWSM
I'll join TikTok (ByteDance) as an summer intern
I received the 2021 IU Luddy Outstanding Research Award
Our paper The COVID-19 Infodemic: Twitter versus Facebook has been published in Big Data & Society
New preprint The impact of online misinformation on U.S. COVID-19 vaccinations available
Our paper Persona2vec: a flexible multi-role representations learning framework for graphs has been published in PeerJ Computer Science
Our paper Systematic Evaluation of State Policy Interventions Targeting the US Opioid Epidemic, 2007-2018 has been published in JAMA Network Open
Check out our new CoVaxxy tool to visualize the COVID-19 vaccine discussion on Twitter; the corresponding preprint is also available

Check out our OSoMeTweet Python package to access Twitter's V2 API
